en.desc:
This is a collection of examples showing how to do strategy research through backtesters, how to plot results,
how to perform strategy parameter optimization.
en.title: How to do strategy research via backtesters

zh.desc: 这组例子展示如何使用回测器进行策略研究，如何书写策略，如何回测，如何绘制结果，如何进行策略参数优化等。
zh.title: 如何使用回测器进行策略研究

en.desc:
This is a collection of live trading strategies. They show how you perform live trading.
They also serve as tests the live trading behavior in different situations.
en.title: Live trading strategies

zh.desc: 这组例子展示如何进行实盘交易，同时他们也作为测试用例来测试在不同场景下交易的情况。
zh.title: 实盘交易策略
